alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Northwest Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 7:56PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 845 PM MST... At 756 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wickenburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wickenburg, Wittmann, Circle City and Morristown. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 101 and 133. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Northwest Valley; Tonopah Desert
